item.description:
Happy Holidays!

Our next meeting, January 2nd, is going to come quick!  We want to let you know that we have the pleasure of hosting Joe Craft, of Craft Financial Solutions.  Mr. Craft will discuss tax planning and preparation tips for small business and real estate.  Many New England REIA members use Craft Financial Solutions as their primary accountant and tax prep service provider.

We all know taxes can be a drag, however, when you know what to do and save money, they become a lot less daunting.  Make sure to mark your calendars and come down with a list of questions to ask Mr. Craft.  He will be more than happy to give you advice for your particular situation and he can even schedule a consult with you to further discuss your situation.

 

We hope you have a safe and happy holiday season and we look forward to seeing you all in January!

 

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Real Estate & Business Tax Prep & Planning
